data.thought: S13|H|S10|Reactive+Container Phenotype B3: 'Live Code Playground'. User edits code in notebook cell. On save: container spawns, code executes in isolation, output streams back. Hot reload on subsequent edits. Observable: execution state, memory usage, timing. Key: sandboxed execution of arbitrary user code w/o polluting host. Diff from Srcbook default: container isolation, observable metrics, Thoughtbox-assisted error explanation.
